div.data-options: { "search": "`googlehangouts` | where user_name_sender=user_name_self | eval word = split(text,\" \") | mvexpand(word) | eval length=len(word) | where length>0 | eval word=lower(word) | stats count by word | sort -count", "earliest_time": "", "status_buckets": 0, "cancelOnUnload": true, "auto_cancel": 90, "preview": true }

table.title: Hyperlinks history
table.searchString: `googlehangouts` | search hyperlink=* | eval link=hyperlink | table _time user_name_sender hyperlink link| sort -_time

single.title: How often do you write "$word1$"?
single.searchString: `googlehangouts` | where user_name_sender=user_name_self | eval text=lower(text)| search (text="$word1$" OR text="$word1$%" OR text="% $word1$ %" OR text="% $word1$")| stats count

single.title: How often do you write "$word2$"?

table.title: Occurences of word by user
table.searchString: `googlehangouts` | eval text=lower(text)| search (text="$word3$" OR text="$word3$%" OR text="% $word3$ %" OR text="% $word3$")| stats count by user_name_sender | sort -count
